summary: The 'Rural Development Hospital Technical Assistance Program Act of 2025' aims to codify the Rural Hospital Technical Assistance Program of the Department of Agriculture. It establishes a program to provide technical assistance and training to eligible rural hospital facilities. This assistance will help them identify development needs, manage financial strategies, and access USDA loan and grant programs. The bill outlines program goals, participation guidelines, and reporting requirements, with authorized appropriations for fiscal years 2025-2029.
